articles.title: Scott Morrison abandons target to have all Australians vaccinated against COVID-19 by the end of the year - ABC News
articles.description: Scott Morrison says given the uncertainties around the AstraZeneca vaccine, the federal government can no longer set targets for the delivery of COVID-19 vaccinations.
articles.content:
The Prime Minister has abandoned all targets for the nationwide rollout of COVID-19 vaccines after new medical advice threw the program into disarray.
